name: Typeventure
description:
Typeventure will test your skills on the keyboard!

Avoid obstacles and capture chests for more points and lifes.

To keep the wizard under control, one of the 3 keys must always be pressed.

Good luck!

If you like the game please don't forget to vote. Thank you :)

Assets used in the game:

Music from https://freemusicarchive.org/genre/Chiptune/

SoundFX created in from https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com

Sprites from https://opengameart.org

create by @lua_consoni
